artist: Larsen Design Studio; Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Open weave with a variety of yarns and textures, Vertical stripes form the basic weave pattern, larger horizontal stripes created with bulky chenille in contrasting color. Green, rust, white, gold warp.  White & metallic green weft.  Loose Weave.  White chenille forms horiz. bands. Right selvedge. (white, off-white, yellow, green metallic, beige, light green, rust)

title: Cornsilk B
